Uses of Interface
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler.Scheduler

Packages that use Scheduler
Package
Description
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler
This package provides multiple scheduling algorithms that the servers can use.
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server
This package provides the main functionality to create resource pools and servers.

  • Uses of Scheduler in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler

    Subinterfaces of Scheduler in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    ReservationScheduler
    Common interface that schedulers that enable reservations must implement in order to be used by Server.
    Classes in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler that implement Scheduler
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractScheduler
    Each server has a scheduling policy that defines how the server resources are allocated to work units.
    class 
    AggrBackfillScheduler
    AggrBackfillScheduler class is an allocation policy for Server that implements aggressive backfilling.
    class 
    BackfillingScheduler
    Abstract class with helper methods common across all backfilling policies.
    class 
    ConsBackfillScheduler
    ConsBackfillScheduler class is an allocation policy for Server that implements conservative backfilling.
    class 
    DefaultScheduler
    This class implements a simple scheduler where the waiting queue can be ordered in different ways.
    class 
    PreemptionScheduler
    This class implements a scheduler with preemption and where the waiting queue can be ordered in different ways.
    class 
    ResConsBackfillScheduler
    ResConsBackfillScheduler class is an allocation policy for Server that implements conservative backfilling and supports advance reservations.

  • Uses of Scheduler in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Scheduler
    Server.getSchedulingPolicy()
    Returns the scheduling policy used by this server.
